hero.title: Welcome! I'm Mario, a software developer with skills in creating on-demand web applications
hero.description: On this site, I share my projects and teach others how to build scalable, real-world software using Python, Next.js, and more.

profile.title: About me
profile.description: I am a full-stack software developer based in Colombia who has skills in building web applications.  I am enthusiastic about learning, sharing knowledge, and creating apps and user interfaces that address real-world challenges with cutting-edge technologies such as Python, JavaScript (React, NextJS), and Java, among others.
